name: Wayblock
description:
Wayblock is a New Puzzle Game! You can use just the available blocks (Wayblocks) to make a way until the Infinity fire. If you are Ready, click in the player and Go!NEW WORLD!ICING ON THE CAKE
The game will have constant FREE Updates. New stages, new worlds, new caracteres!



Welcome to the FREE Extra Content Bar! As soon as this bar reach 100%, the game will be updated with content of the next level TOTALLY FREE! Then, The Goal Update Bar will be go back to 0% and continue filling again. Share the game for your friends. The more the better!


  • + 10 New Levels (Forgotten Green)
Totalizing: 100 Levels.
